title.rendered: Pretoria vs Cape Town, South Africa T20 League 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Pretoria: Kusal Mendis (wk), Will Jacks, Rilee Rossouw, Theunis de Bruyn, Clyde Fortuin, James Neesham, Senuran Muthusamy, Wayne Parnell (c), Eathan Bosch, Adil Rashid, Anrich Nortje

Cape Town: Dewald Brevis, Grant Roelofsen (wk), Rassie van der Dussen, Tim David, Delano Potgieter/Sam Curran, George Linde, Duan Jansen, Rashid Khan (c), Odean Smith/Jofra Archer, Beuran Hendricks, Kagiso Rabada

Pitch Report

Venue: SuperSport Park, Centurion

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 161

2nd innings average score: 172

Wickets per innings: 7

Type: Good for batting

Wins

Batting 1st: 33%

Batting 2nd: 67%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

At the SuperSport Park this season, Adil Rashid has taken consecutive two-wicket hauls.

James Neesham has been effective with both bat and ball of late. He has taken 3 for 7 and 1 for 13 at the venue, and has scored 116 runs at 28 in his last 10 outings.

In the previous game between these teams, Will Jacks (62 off 27 and a wicket) and Rashid Khan (3 for 16) were the captain and vice-captain of the Ultimate Team respectively.

Jacks also has put up top performances at the venue this season, with scores of 92 and 34.

Anrich Nortje has gone wicketless only once in the tournament, overall scalping 13 wickets in just 7 games.

Tim David has been a delight in fantasy leagues. He made it to the Ultimate Team in 8 of his last 10 matches.

Rile Rossouw’s misery with the bat continues. It’s been 9 innings since he scored past 20 runs.

In the last 3 games at the venue, pacers took 36 of 44 wickets.
